trans-unit.source: The type of channel that the channel factory creates.
trans-unit.target: 通道工厂创建的通道的类型。

trans-unit.source: Defines the interface that must be implemented by channel factories that create type-specific channels.
trans-unit.target: 定义必须由创建特定类型通道的通道工厂实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: Implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601> contract allows users to create multiple channels of a given type without having to specify the channel type each time.
trans-unit.target: 通过实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601> 协定，用户可以创建具有某种给定类型的多个通道，而不必每次都指定通道类型。

trans-unit.source: In other words, defining the channel type as a generic parameter for the channel factory implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601> interface means that it is not necessary to pass the type into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 换言之，将通道类型定义为实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601> 接口的通道工厂的泛型参数，意味着无需将该类型传入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If users want to create different channel types, they can create additional channel factories for each type of channel required.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户希望创建不同的通道类型，则可以为所需要的每个通道类型创建其他通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> overload allows you to distinguish the address to which the message is initially sent from the ultimate destination.
trans-unit.target: 利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> 重载可以区分最初消息要发送到的地址与最终目标。

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of addressing, see the [Addresses](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关寻址的讨论，请参阅[地址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Creates a channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 创建到指定终结点地址的指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> overload to distinguish the address to which the message is initially sent from the ultimate destination when you want to do manual routing.
trans-unit.target: 利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> 重载区分最初消息要发送到的地址与希望进行手动路由时的最终目标。

trans-unit.source: Note that any channels created by this channel factory are closed when the channel factory is closed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当此通道工厂关闭时，此通道工厂创建的任何通道也将关闭。

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of addressing, see the [Addresses](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关寻址的讨论，请参阅[地址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> that provides the location of the service.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务位置的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 创建到指定终结点地址的指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: A channel of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> to the specified endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 到指定终结点地址的类型为 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 的通道。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> overload to distinguish the address to which the message is initially sent from the ultimate destination when you want to do manual routing.
trans-unit.target: 利用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%2CSystem.Uri%29> 重载区分最初消息要发送到的地址与希望进行手动路由时的最终目标。

trans-unit.source: Note that any channels created by this channel factory are closed when the channel factory is closed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当此通道工厂关闭时，此通道工厂创建的任何通道也将关闭。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" /> that provides the location of the service.
trans-unit.target: 提供服务位置的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the transport address to which the message is sent.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，包含要将消息发送至的传输地址。

trans-unit.source: Creates a channel of a specified type to a specified endpoint address and transport address to which messages are sent.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定类型的通道，该通道通向消息要发送到的指定终结点地址和传输地址。

trans-unit.source: A channel of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> to the specified endpoint address and transport address.
trans-unit.target: 到指定终结点地址和传输地址的 <paramref name="TChannel" /> 类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: The transport address specified by the `via` is the location to which a message should initially be sent on its way to some other remote address specified by the `to` at which the service is located.
trans-unit.target: `via` 指定的传输地址是消息在发送到由 `to` 指定的服务所在的某个其他远程地址的途中，最初应发送到的位置。

trans-unit.source: In most Internet scenarios, the `via` URI is the same as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> of the final `to` address of the service.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数 Internet 方案中，`via` URI 和服务的最终 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress.Uri%2A> 地址的 `to` 相同。

trans-unit.source: You only distinguish between these two addresses when you want to do some kind of manual routing.
trans-unit.target: 您只在进行某种手动路由时才区分这两个地址。

trans-unit.source: Note that any channels created by this channel factory are closed when the channel factory is closed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当此通道工厂关闭时，此通道工厂创建的任何通道也将关闭。

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of addressing, see the [Addresses](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关寻址的讨论，请参阅[地址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/endpoint-addresses.md)主题。
